[OPTIONAL] [EN] Default tone need to update.

favourite.description:
[OPTIONAL] 当前用户是否喜欢
[OPTIONAL] [EN] User favourite or not.

description.description:
[可选] 模版描述.
[EN] [Optional] CommiTemplate description.

category.description:
模版类别.
The Category of template.

tags.description:
[可选] 标签
[EN] [Optional] Tags of template.

thumbnail.title:
模版预览图名字，需要预先上传.
[EN] Thumbnail path. Supports web address and local path

content.title:
脚本模版的内容. 使用{{`key`}}来标识模版中的变量.
key的值需要和`CommiTemplateScriptParameter`中的key一致.
[EN] The content of script template. Use {{`key`}} to mark variables in the template.
[EN] The content of key needs to be the same as the key name in the `CommiTemplateScriptParameter,

parameters.description:
脚本模版参数，需要与脚本模版内容中的变量标识的数量保持一致.
如果脚本模版内容里面没有变量标识，可不写.
[EN] The parameter of script template.
[EN] The number of parameters should be the same as the number of variable marks in the script template content.
[EN] Omit it if no marks in the script template content.

content.description:
[OPTIONAL] 脚本模版内容. 若为空则不变.
[OPTIONAL] New content.

parameters.description:
[OPTIONAL] 脚本模版参数, content为空时无效.
[OPTIONAL] 需要与脚本模版内容中的变量标识的数量保持一致.
[OPTIONAL] 如果脚本模版内容里面没有变量标识，可不写.
[OPTIONAL] [EN] The parameter of new content. Invalid if content is empty.
[OPTIONAL] [EN] The number of parameters should be the same as the number of variable marks in the script template content.
[OPTIONAL] [EN] Omit it if no marks in the script template content.

name.description:
[Optional] 更新的名称. 若为空则不变.
[Optional] [EN] New name. Unchanged if empty.

description.description:
[Optional] 更新的描述. 若为空则不变.
[Optional] [EN] New description. Unchanged if empty.

tags.description:
[Optional] 更新的tags. 全量. 若为空则不变.
[Optional] [EN] All new tags. Unchanged if empty.

thumbnail.description:
[Optional] 更新的图片的地址. 若为空则不变.
[Optional] [EN] New thumbnail. Supports web address and local path. Unchanged if empty.

favourite.description:
[Optional] 设置是否喜欢. 为空不变. 1不喜欢, 2喜欢
[Optional] [EN] Set user favourite optional.

variable_name.description:
在 WATI 模板中定义的用于放置视频地址的变量名称
The variable name defined in the WATI template for placing share video address.

name.description:
[OPTIONAL] 视频名称，如果没写的话会根据template名称和时间戳自动生成.
[OPTIONAL] [EN] Video name.
[OPTIONAL] [EN] If not specified, it will be generated based on the template name + current timestamp.

description.description:
[OPTIONAL] 视频描述.
[OPTIONAL] [EN] The description of video.

template_id.description:
生成视频使用的模版的id.
[EN] The template id to use when generating the video.

script_id.description:
脚本模版的id.
[EN] script template id.

script_parameter.description:
使用的脚本模版的参数键值对，如果脚本模版没有变量则为空.
[EN] The key-value pairs of the using script template. Keep null if the script template has no variables.

tone.description:
[OPTIONAL] 额外指定语气, 不写使用speaker的默认值.
[OPTIONAL] [EN] Additional tone.
[OPTIONAL] [EN] Use speaker's default tone if null.

result_callback_url.description:
[OPTIONAL] 视频生成结果的回调地址, 如果为空可通过VideoGet接口获取生成后的视频.
[OPTIONAL] [EN] The callback URL for the video generation result.
[OPTIONAL] [EN] Can also use the VideoGet API to get the generated video.

source.description:
[INTERNAL] 视频调用方, 如果为空则是WEBUI.
[INTERNAL] [EN] The caller of this api, defaut is WEBUI if null.

name.description:
[OPTIONAL] 更新的视频名称. 若为空则不更新.
[OPTIONAL] [EN] New name. Unchanged if empty.

description.description:
[OPTIONAL] 更新的视频描述. 若为空则不更新.
[OPTIONAL] [EN] New description. Unchanged if empty.

audio_sample.description: Name of an audio sample file for the speaker.

avatar_image.description: Name of an image file used as the speaker's avatar.

tone.description: Default tone used by the speaker.

favourite.description: Indicates whether the speaker is marked as a favourite by the user.

create_at.description: Timestamp when the speaker profile was created.

update_at.description: Timestamp when the speaker profile was last updated.

commiSpeaker.description: Speaker represents a speaker's profile used in video templates.

thumbnail_url.description: URL of the thumbnail image, valid for 24 hours.

default_speaker.description: Template default speaker. Use to get speaker sample video.

favourite.description: Indicates whether the template is marked as a favourite by the user.

create_at.description: Timestamp when the template was created.

update_at.description: Timestamp when the template was last updated.

content.description: Content of the script template, which includes placeholders for parameters denoted by `{{key}}`.

parameters.description: Detailed definitions of parameters used within the script template content.

create_at.description: Timestamp when the script template was created.

update_at.description: Timestamp when the script template was last updated.

commiTemplateScript.description: TemplateScript represents a script template that contains text with placeholders for variable content.

key.description: The unique key/name of the variable within the template.

default_value.description: Default value for the variable if no value is provided.

is_required.description: Indicates whether this parameter is mandatory. If true, the default value is used if no value is provided. If false, the sentence containing the parameter will be omitted if no value is provided.

code.description:
Generic service and system error codes, see the system standard error table for HTTP errors and semantics.
If the error is business-specific, the code should return 0, see status and error for details.

commonResult.description: Generic result return. Typically returns the error status of each subrequest in a Batch class request.

shared_item_id.description: video id for sharing. valid for 1 month.

other_custom_params.description: other WATI custom param. Will pass through to the WATI server.

video_url.description: URL of the generated video, valid for 24 hours.

thumbnail_url.description: URL of the video thumbnail, valid for 24 hours. Defaults to the template's thumbnail if not specified.

duration.description: Duration of the video in seconds.

category.description: Video category, matching the template used.

template_id.description: ID of the template used for generating the video.

speaker_id.description: ID of the speaker used in the video.

script_id.description: ID of the script template used in the video.

script_parameter.description: Key-value pairs for script parameters, where the key is the parameter name and the value is the content filled into the template.

tone.description: Tone of the video, defaults to the speaker's tone if not specified.

status.description: Current status of the video generation task.
